1.0.name: wordpress/wallwisher-shortcode
1.0.description:
Allows the use of special short codes [padlet] and [wallwisher] for embedding Padlet walls. The short code can be found in the Share section of a wall's sidebar on padlet.com

Example:

[padlet key="8ftvxj" height="480" width="100%"]

or

[wallwisher key="8ftvxj" height="480" width="100%"]
